Experiment

Source: vignettes/experiment.Rmd
experiment.Rmd
library(rexpect)
library(purrr)

parts <- cmd("sessionInfo()") %>%
  cmd_r() %>%
  cmd_docker("rocker/tidyverse") %>%
  cmd_asciinema()
#> Recording asciicast at /var/folders/8h/88ch3k996hb0t11db8bj9pzh0000gn/T//RtmpjiF0Ih/file7c545d0ba1ef
parts
#> [1] "asciinema"                                                                    
#> [2] "rec"                                                                          
#> [3] "/var/folders/8h/88ch3k996hb0t11db8bj9pzh0000gn/T//RtmpjiF0Ih/file7c545d0ba1ef"
#> [4] "-q"                                                                           
#> [5] "--overwrite"                                                                  
#> [6] "-c"                                                                           
#> [7] "docker run --rm -i -t rocker/tidyverse R --vanilla -e 'sessionInfo()'"
